edu.rit.pjmr

Class MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pjmr.MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV>
  • Type Parameters:
    IK - Mapper input key data type.
    IV - Mapper input value data type.
    OK - Mapper output key data type.
    OV - Mapper output value data type; must implement interface Vbl.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable

    public class MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
extends Object
implements Streamable
    Class MapperTaskConfig contains specifications for configuring a mapper task.

    • Method Detail

      • source

        public SourceConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> source(Source<IK,IV> source)
        Add the given Source to this mapper task. A mapper task must include at least one source; it may include more than one source. After calling source(), call mapper() on the returned SourceConfig object to attach one or more mappers to the source.
        Parameters:
        source - Source.
        Returns:
        Source config object for source.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if source is null.

      • customizer

        public <T extends Customizer<OK,OV>> MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> customizer(Class<T> customizerClass,
                                                                     String... args)
        Specify the given Customizer for this mapper task. The argument strings for the customizer, if any, may also be specified. The default is not to use a customizer.
        Parameters:
        customizerClass - Customizer class.
        args - Zero or more argument strings for the customizer.
        Returns:
        This mapper task config object.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if customizerClass is null.

      • threads

        public MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> threads(int threads)
        Specify this mapper task's threads property. For further information, see TaskSpec.threads().
        Parameters:
        threads - Number of threads (≥ 1).
        Returns:
        This mapper task config object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if threads is illegal.

      • schedule

        public MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> schedule(Schedule schedule)
        Specify this mapper task's schedule property. For further information, see TaskSpec.schedule().
        Parameters:
        schedule - Parallel for loop schedule.
        Returns:
        This mapper task config object.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if schedule is null.

      • chunk

        public MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> chunk(int chunk)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if chunk is illegal.

      • jvmFlags

        public MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> jvmFlags(String... jvmFlags)
        Specify the JVM flags for this mapper task. For further information, see TaskSpec.jvmFlags().
        Parameters:
        jvmFlags - JVM flags (zero or more).
        Returns:
        This mapper task config object.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if jvmFlags is null or any element of jvmFlags is null.

        Returns:
